long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
# ğŸš€ IG Follower Export Tool - One-Click Instagram Data Extraction | Efficient Export, Easy Management

## User Guide

1. **Launch the Extension**: Click the **IG Follower Export - IG Email Extractor** extension icon, then select the "Export Instagram Data" button to open the options page.
2. **Input User Information**: Enter a valid Instagram user address or INS ID in the specified area.
3. **Start Parsing**: Click the "Start New Parsing" button. The **IG Follower Export Tools** will automatically begin running. You can choose to pause data scraping at any time or wait for the data processing to complete, then click "Save to CSV" or "Save to Excel" to download the Instagram followers or fans data as a CSV or Excel file.

## Features

- **One-Click Export**: Export Instagram followers and following lists with a single click via the extension.
- **Large-Scale Support**: Supports exporting up to 50,000 Instagram followers or following users.
- **Multiple Formats**: Data can be exported in CSV and Excel formats.
- **Rate Limit Handling**: Automatically handles Instagram's rate limit issues to ensure continuous data scraping.
- **Efficient and Convenient**: One-click operation for quick export of commercial data, improving work efficiency.

## Supported Data Columns

- **ID**
- **Username**
- **Full Name**
- **IG User Address**
- **IG Profile Picture URL**
- **User Verification Status**

## Security

- **Data Privacy Protection**: The extension does not require your Instagram password or collect any of your personal data, including user information, stories, browsing history, posts, or social relationships.
- **Rate Limit Explanation**: Instagram enforces request rate limits based on your IP address. These limits are not publicly disclosed and may vary dynamically.

## How It Works

- **Rate Limit Handling**: If you encounter rate limit errors while exporting a large number of Instagram followers, the extension will automatically enter "cooldown" mode.
- **Cooldown Mechanism**: A timer will display the remaining cooldown time. If rate limit errors persist, the cooldown period will double.
- **Return to Normal**: Once the cooldown period ends and subsequent requests are successful, the **IG Follower Export Tools** will switch back to normal mode and continue data scraping.

# ğŸš€ IG Follower Export Tool - One-Click Instagram Data Extraction | Efficient Export, Easy Management

## User Guide

1. **Launch the Extension**: Click the **IG Follower Export - IG Email Extractor** extension icon, then select the "Export Instagram Data" button to open the options page.
2. **Input User Information**: Enter a valid Instagram user address or INS ID in the specified area.
3. **Start Parsing**: Click the "Start New Parsing" button. The **IG Follower Export Tools** will automatically begin running. You can choose to pause data scraping at any time or wait for the data processing to complete, then click "Save to CSV" or "Save to Excel" to download the Instagram followers or fans data as a CSV or Excel file.

## Features

- **One-Click Export**: Export Instagram followers and following lists with a single click via the extension.
- **Large-Scale Support**: Supports exporting up to 50,000 Instagram followers or following users.
- **Multiple Formats**: Data can be exported in CSV and Excel formats.
- **Rate Limit Handling**: Automatically handles Instagram's rate limit issues to ensure continuous data scraping.
- **Efficient and Convenient**: One-click operation for quick export of commercial data, improving work efficiency.

## Supported Data Columns

- **ID**
- **Username**
- **Full Name**
- **IG User Address**
- **IG Profile Picture URL**
- **User Verification Status**

## Security

- **Data Privacy Protection**: The extension does not require your Instagram password or collect any of your personal data, including user information, stories, browsing history, posts, or social relationships.
- **Rate Limit Explanation**: Instagram enforces request rate limits based on your IP address. These limits are not publicly disclosed and may vary dynamically.

## How It Works

- **Rate Limit Handling**: If you encounter rate limit errors while exporting a large number of Instagram followers, the extension will automatically enter "cooldown" mode.
- **Cooldown Mechanism**: A timer will display the remaining cooldown time. If rate limit errors persist, the cooldown period will double.
- **Return to Normal**: Once the cooldown period ends and subsequent requests are successful, the **IG Follower Export Tools** will switch back to normal mode and continue data scraping.
